title: Doctors' protests hit Kolkata's restaurants, revenue slump
description: Kolkata's food and beverage industry has faced a notable drop in sales due to protests over a tragic incident at RG Kar Hospital. Business owners have noted a decrease in customer turnout but are cautiously hopeful about a rebound during the Durga Puja festivities. The protests continue to affect various parts of the city.
